title: Racial discriminator
body: The guy whose name is [REMOVED - [REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)] is a racial discriminator, After the game finished, no people talked with him, but he still typied the sentences like China dog country, it's disgusting, can you ban his account forever? i can show screenshot.

replies.body: chinese come play my game 2am, boosting account,n linking their service (in chinese) at endgame lobby smh china

A country is not a person and is open to criticism, like religion. 

You can say USA sucks, France sucks, Russia sucks, China sucks, same deal, there's no race involved.
